entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023
